amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 117-381 to require agencies collecting information through a covered survey to establish data standards and protocols for anonymizing data collected and destroying personally-identifiable information at the appropriate time, which cannot be later than 3 years after the date that the information was collected.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn B.
